ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Williamson,Bill Ward,Bob Campbell,Carl Burgos,Don Orehek,Joe Kiernan,Joe Maneely,John Severin,Paul Reinman,Russ Heath,Bill Ward,Ed Winiarski,Carl Burgos,Paul Reinman,Joe Maneely,John Severin,Bill Everett,Russ Heath,Don Orehek

ComicInfo.Title: Why Doesn't This Ever Happen?; So You're Going to College; Sixteen and a Half Tons of Friendship; Shakespeare: The Bard Who Wrote by the Yard; Marjorie Morninglory; Your Christmas Shopping Guide; Cracked Brings You Greetings; Sports; News Flash from Behind the Iron Curtain; Chef of the Month; Max Walliss Interviews Jayne Womansfield; Little Mercurochrome and Denny the Menaces; The $64,000,000 Cracked-Pot Question; Famous Advertising Slogans; Brave Guy; How to Build a Hot Hot Rod; Gunsmokes; Editor's Press Interview
ComicInfo.Summary: A masked hero and his Native sidekick Toronto are surrounded by a band of Natives, whereupon Toronto switches allegiances.
